H3.text: Where certain religions divide the notion of heaven into parts there are generally. 7

A4.text: The seven heavens are not final destinations for the dead after the Day of Judgment, but regions distinct from the earth, guarded by angels and inhabited by souls whose abode depends on their good deeds (fasting, jihad, Hajj, charity)

A5.text: A person being taken up in a vision to a 'third heaven' is mentioned in Paul the Apostle's Second Epistle to the Corinthians (2 Corinthians 12:2â€“4)
